relation: Great for these types of students
Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
People who are focused on growing spiritually as well as academically.
When guys get engaged they have to jump in the pond.
You can play pool and ping pong on campus, and there is a mall and theater close by.
Make sure to go to all the freshman events.
It is a fun small school. Everyone knows everyone and you get to interact with your teachers on a very personal level. The teachers are there to help you succeed.

TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {61742=ice skating (free during sga date week! and you don't actually have to have a date), the zoo (tons of concerts at the okc zoo ampitheater, if you're into concerts), work out (oc is building a new outdoor 5k running trail which will be completed in july 2012), get involved in sga., 17770=an annual tradition at oklahoma christian university is the holiday hussle. university and local community members gather together for a 5k race in november. spring sing is another tradition that has students, faculty, alumni and communities far and wide have come to love and enjoy. clubs compete through dance and music to achieve the ultimate prize of recognition and a club trophy., 208914=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 100991=There are times when I have left campus at 10:30 and walked out to my car and felt completely safe. We have plenty of campus security to secure your safety.}

textAfterTable: Everyone, sports orientated (except football) Engineering, Art, Theatre, Communications, Nursing, Accounting, the good the bad the ugly. This school is great for everyone, it really depends if everyone is willing to attend is all. It is a Christian University and really that is what attracted me to the school. I wanted to be in an environment where God is the center and even when I know that I was doing wrong, I would know where to turn. Which is back to Christ. Tips for prospective students Show up to class on time, and take lots of notes or have a friend who can do both. Have fun but not too much fun. When you are feeling down, don't hold in all of your feelings inside. The school also provides counseling for really tough times and there are support groups. The food is good but don't over load. Freshman fifteen is the new size two. Enjoy but be smart. You are accountable for all of your actions. Bang for the buck The school is a private institution which means it will cost more. However each student is provided with a MacBook, and the choice of an iPhone, iTouch, or iPad. Not to mention using the school's laundry facilities is free. You are definitely getting what you pay for and more. The food is not half
